title: Does being inactive make me ineligible for ranked rewards?
body: Stopped playing ranked a while back because I got a new job a bunch of things changed that made me start playing more casually and have decayed for quite a while but want to know if I am still eligible for rewards?

replies.body:
You should be good to go as long as you weren't boosted or have a suspension towards the end of the season, as listed in [this announcement.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230496748)

You may want to play some more ranked to counteract that decay, though.
Hey man, thanks for the quick reply! I appreciate that a lot.
